column1: Our communities across the state rely on small businesses. Right now they need our support. I encourage you to get out and #ShopLocal on this Small Business Saturday.
Join me and my family in supporting our local favorites today for Small Business Saturday. #ShopLocal

The soul of America is at stake in #GASen. Chuck Schumer wants to make DC a state pack the court with liberal judges & justices and implement their radical socialist agenda.   Join me and stand with @Kloeffler & @Perduesenate. https://t.co/KTfJN2aFSP
The #COVID19 pandemic has hit our small businesses hard and we need to get out to support them. Don’t forget to #ShopLocal today for Small Business Saturday.
Small Business Saturday is a great time to visit your local stores and knock out some Christmas shopping. #ShopLocal https://t.co/LY5N0Wo04w

Washington Dems like Chuck Schumer Nancy Pelosi and AOC want to implement their socialist agenda - packing the courts Green New Deal government-run health care and more. We can’t afford their extreme agenda. We must support @Kloeffler & @Perduesenate.  https://t.co/KTfJN2sgKn
Americans deserve a fair election system process. That’s what President @realDonaldTrump is fighting for and I continue to stand with him.
Chelsea Guy and I wish you and yours a Happy Thanksgiving. https://t.co/PmrPDfldpn

Chuck Schumer wants to change America. He wants to turn our country into a socialized nation. We can’t let that happen. Join me and support @Kloeffler & @Perduesenate today. #GASen https://t.co/KTfJN2sgKn
I am a proud supporter of the 2nd Amendment. As your representative I will always be a reliable voice for protecting one of our most fundamental rights as American citizens. #2A
I agree with President @realDonaldTrump we must ensure every legally cast vote is counted.   RT if you agree!
President @realDonaldTrump is working to protect the integrity of our election system. That means one person one vote. I continue to stand with President Trump and his efforts.

In everything I do I hope to represent #TN6 as a Christian man who will protect our Tennessee values. That’s why I support the #RightToLife and will always support #prolife policies.

Americans deserve better than to be left to speculate about the honesty & fairness of the elections in other states that will determine our next President. The trickling in of ballots beyond election day invites opportunities for fraud from bad actors. This practice must change.
